name: New White Tiles Free - But Don't Touch/Tap the Connectly White tile
name_original: New White Tiles Free - But Don't Touch/Tap the Connectly White tile
description:
Watch your step, DON'T TAP THE WHITE TILE. This is the only rule in this additive game.
Try it, and see how well you stack up against your friends.

Features:
+ 4 different game modes
+ Smooth gameplay
+ Optimised for high resolution screen
+ Social network sharing
